languages.text: "Вы думали, что убили Зарю, ложноверцы?! Дрожите, ибо я — Заря! Я — глашатай перемен! Узрите Последний восход — и умрите!"
"You thought you had killed Aurora, false believers? Tremble, for I am Aurora! I am the herald of change! Behold the Final Dawn... and die!"
languages.original_text: "Вы думали, что убили Зарю, ложноверцы?! Дрожите, ибо я — Заря! Я — глашатай перемен! Узрите Последний восход — и умрите!"

traits.locale_text: "You thought you had killed Aurora, false believers? Tremble, for I am Aurora! I am the herald of change! Behold the Final Dawn... and die!"
"You thought you had killed Aurora, false believers? Tremble, for I am Aurora! I am the herald of change! Behold the Final Dawn... and die!"
"You thought you had killed Aurora, false believers? Tremble, for I am Aurora! I am the herald of change! Behold the Final Dawn... and die!"
"You thought you had killed Aurora, false believers? Tremble, for I am Aurora! I am the herald of change! Behold the Final Dawn... and die!"

languages.text: “你们以为你们杀了‘曙光’，是吗，伪神的信徒们？颤抖吧，我就是曙光！我就是变革的先驱者！迎接这终末黎明……然后去死吧！”
languages.original_text: "You thought you had killed Aurora, false believers? Tremble, for I am Aurora! I am the herald of change! Behold the Final Dawn... and die!"

traits.locale_text: “你们以为你们杀了‘曙光’，是吗，伪神的信徒们？颤抖吧，我就是曙光！我就是变革的先驱者！迎接这终末黎明……然后去死吧！”

languages.text: 「偽りの信仰者たちよ、本当にオーロラを殺したと思っていたのか？震えよ、私こそがオーロラ！変化の先触れ！最後の夜明けを見て…死ぬがいい！」
languages.original_text: "You thought you had killed Aurora, false believers? Tremble, for I am Aurora! I am the herald of change! Behold the Final Dawn... and die!"

traits.locale_text: 「偽りの信仰者たちよ、本当にオーロラを殺したと思っていたのか？震えよ、私こそがオーロラ！変化の先触れ！最後の夜明けを見て…死ぬが良い！」

languages.text: "Dachtet Ihr, Ihr hättet Aurora getötet, falsche Gläubige? Erzittert, denn ich bin Aurora! Ich bin die Heroldin des Wandels! Erblicket die letzte Dämmerung ... und sterbt!"
languages.original_text: "You thought you had killed Aurora, false believers? Tremble, for I am Aurora! I am the herald of change! Behold the Final Dawn... and die!"

traits.locale_text: "Dachtet Ihr, Ihr hättet Aurora getötet, falsche Gläubige? Erzittert, denn ich bin Aurora! Ich bin die Heroldin des Wandels! Erblicket die letzte Dämmerung ... und sterbt!"

languages.text: « Vous pensiez avoir tué Aurore, mécréants ? Tremblez, car je suis Aurore ! Je suis le héraut du changement ! Contemplez l'Aube finale... et mourrez ! »
languages.original_text: "You thought you had killed Aurora, false believers? Tremble, for I am Aurora! I am the herald of change! Behold the Final Dawn... and die!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous pensiez avoir tué Aurore, mécréants ? Tremblez, car je suis Aurore ! Je suis le héraut du changement ! Contemplez l'Aube finale... et mourrez ! »

languages.text: «¿Creíais haber matado a Aurora, falsos creyentes? ¡Temblad, pues yo soy Aurora! ¡Soy el heraldo del cambio! Presenciad el Amanecer Final... ¡y morid!».
languages.original_text: "You thought you had killed Aurora, false believers? Tremble, for I am Aurora! I am the herald of change! Behold the Final Dawn... and die!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Creíais haber matado a Aurora, falsos creyentes? ¡Temblad, pues yo soy Aurora! ¡Soy el heraldo del cambio! Presenciad el Amanecer Final... ¡y morid!».

languages.text: "Aurora'yı öldürdüğünüzü mü sandınız sapkınlar? Ben Aurora, karşımda titreyin! Değişimin öncüsüyüm! Nihai Şafak'la yüzleşin ve geberin!"
languages.original_text: "You thought you had killed Aurora, false believers? Tremble, for I am Aurora! I am the herald of change! Behold the Final Dawn... and die!"

traits.locale_text: "Aurora'yı öldürdüğünüzü mü sandınız sapkınlar? Ben Aurora, karşımda titreyin! Değişimin öncüsüyüm! Nihai Şafak'la yüzleşin ve geberin!"
